articles.title: Climate Policy Reforms Highlight LGBTQ+ Community Resilience
articles.summary: The Times reports on recent climate resilience initiatives in coastal cities prioritizing support for marginalized groups, including LGBTQ+ communities displaced by environmental disasters. The article highlights policy changes in California mandating inclusive disaster relief strategies.

articles.title: Global LGBTQ+ Activists Amplify Climate Justice Demands
articles.summary: International climate summit in Glasgow features prominent LGBTQ+ activists urging governments to address intersecting crises of environmental degradation and social inequality. The piece includes quotes from advocates stressing the disproportionate impact of climate change on vulnerable populations.
